column2: Retrieve a gift from Azi at Yatendi Village.
+125 Condition Damage; gain 25%% endurance after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>
Enchanted Dragon Crown Package now available!
Everything has a price. Seek the woman who reeks of dirt and death.
First, in Fields of Ruin: Go where the mightiest of the walled city rest.

A parting gift from Glint. It hums with strange energy.

Someone in Sun's Refuge might be interested in this.
You cannot target shield generators with this skill.
This will change the appearance of your mount and unlock this roller beetle mount skin for all characters on your account.
<c=@flavor>A special gift for friends of the Zephyrites. Double-click to choose a reward.</c>
The fabric of time is shifting. You cannot remain.
Mad Realm Mounts Pack now available!
Plunder 250 bundles of loot during the Labyrinthine Cliffs treasure hunt.
Koss has long opposed Joko. Appropriate that he carries a keepsake of his fallen foe.
Retrieve a gift from Warmaster Steelburn at the Pact Vanguard camp.
Then, in Fields of Ruin: Seek out shattered storms, a twisting tree, and roots deep in stone.
Double-click to teleport to Jahai Bluffs. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>
Unlock a new mount of your choice.
Contains a random rare item from the Zephyrites' trade stockpiles.

Purchasing this contract sends a Pact excavation team to Sun's Refuge.

This item is consumed immediately.
Add toys, chairs, musical instruments, and held items to your collection, or browse and equip these items from your current collection.

You've unlocked the ability to reenter Sun's Refuge with any character that has access to Jahai Bluffs.

Tasks you complete in Sun's Refuge and Jahai Bluffs can impact how the refuge grows.

There are many secrets to discover in Sun's Refuge. Find them all!
This package bundles the new Dragon Horn, Dragon's Eye Circlet, and Enchanted Dragon Crown helm skins.
Plundered 250 Bundles of Loot during the Labyrinthine Cliffs Treasure Hunt
The crystal glimmers with malice. Use to temporarily transform into a crystalline form.
Double-click to combine a Favor of the Bazaar with a Favor of the Pavilion to create a Favor of the Festival.
Open to choose a pair of Corsair leggings.
